alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Perquimans, northeastern Bertie, Hertford, southwestern Gates and northwestern Chowan Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ahoskie, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cofield around 635 PM EDT. Powellsville around 640 PM EDT. Harrellsville around 650 PM EDT. Colerain around 655 PM EDT. Ryland, Rockyhock and Tyner around 705 PM EDT. Belvidere around 715 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Goose Pond, Whites Crossroads, Tunis, Gliden, Earleys, Menola, Newsome Store, Arrowhead Beach, Chowan Beach and Mount Gould. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
